events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred last night at an intersection, resulting in significant vehicle damage.
The claim has been classified under Auto Accident after reviewing the description and keywords from the initial report.
An insurance agent has been assigned to assist the customer with the auto accident claim and guide through the claims process.
The customer was promptly sent confirmation acknowledging receipt of the auto accident claim and next steps explained.
Requested police report, vehicle photos, and medical bills related to the collision to begin the investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents including police report and photos verifying the extent of the auto damage.
An investigation team has begun review of all submitted documents to determine claim validity and estimate vehicle repair costs.
The investigation into the car accident claim has been completed, confirming the incident details and damage assessment.
A settlement amount was proposed to the customer based on the damage valuation and policy coverage for the auto accident.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the assistance provided so far.
The auto accident claim was officially approved following the settlement agreement and final review of the case.
Payment was issued to the customer to cover the agreed settlement amount for the vehicle damages resulting from the accident.
The claim related to the auto accident has been closed after full payment and resolution, with no pending issues remaining.
All documentation and records for the auto accident claim have been archived securely for future reference if needed.
